title: L.A. City Council District 15 voter guide: Tim McOsker vs Danielle Sandoval
dc:creator: David Zahniser
description: The race to replace Councilmember Joe Buscaino pits Tim McOsker, a lawyer with a history at City Hall, against Danielle Sandoval, a former neighborhood council member.
content:encoded: The race to replace Councilmember Joe Buscaino pits Tim McOsker, a lawyer with a history at City Hall, against Danielle Sandoval, a former neighborhood council member.

media:content.media:description: L.A. City Council District 15 candidates Tim McOsker and Danielle Sandoval.
